about.title: Hey, I'm Eduardo
about.descriptionOne: I am a highly motivated Android Engineer with a relentless focus on delivering outstanding products. Passionate about innovation, I continuously seek cutting-edge solutions to refine my work and stay ahead in an ever-evolving industry.
about.descriptionTwo: Since beginning my coding journey in 2017, I have transitioned from web development to specializing in mobile development with Java and Kotlin, where I found my true passion. Combining technical expertise with a commitment to staying current on industry trends, I deliver fresh, impactful solutions. My dedication ensures visually striking and highly functional applications that resonate with users.

finn.title: Finn
finn.description: A Social Media of Forums (like Reddit)
